name: EthSign
shortDescription: Decentralized, versioned electronic agreement signing Dapp built with Web3 technologies
description:
EthSign is a decentralized, versioned electronic agreement signing DApp built with Web3 technologies.

EthSign is built upon the Web3 infrastructure that has just become mature over the past few years: Decentralized Identity, smart contract platforms and decentralized storage network, providing same functions as its Web 2 signing applications: uploading agreements, agreement signing, and the verification of signatures and versioning agreement in the future.
